content: मल्लिका {@--1@} A kind of goose with brown legs and bill. {@--2@} The month Māgha. {@--3@} A shuttle.

मल्लिका {@--1@} A kind of jasmine; वनेषु सायंतनमल्लिकानां विजृंभणोद्गंधिषु कुड्मलेषु <ls>R. 16. 47.</ls> {@--2@} A flower of this jasmine; विन्यस्तसायंतनमल्लिकेषु ( केशेषु) <ls>R. 16. 50</ls>; <ls>Kāv. 2. 215.</ls> {@--3@} A lamp-stand. {@--4@} An earthen vessel of a particular form.
